creator: Funexpected LTD
descriptionHtml:
Featured by Apple UK: "Funexpected Maths can help your child’s skills grow through play. The app is full of fun games that will also challenge their developing minds." (New Apps We Love, Sep 2019).

*** Winner of a Kidscreen award, Webby People’s Choice award, gold winner of Horizon Interactive award and a part of Notable Media list by the American Library Association ***

The truth is — we don't teach kids stand-alone skills, but rather, introduce them to pleasures of finding mathematical truth in real-world settings, then ignite practice of thinking logically, flexibly and quickly.

To do so Funexpected Maths app will turn your device into a colorful, vibrant playground full of playable learning adventures. When kids understand there are numerous ways to solve a problem, Maths reveals as a beautiful, open, creative, and multi-dimensional subject.

The more kids practice with games in scenic realms of Funexpected Maths, the closer they’ll get to «Maths fluency»: the ability to recombine and relate concepts freely in a variety of circumstances. As bonus kids are going to gain firm maths-confidence and long-lasting positive attitude toward mathematics

So, the time has come, and an ever-evolving collection of wondrous games awaits on the World Atlas! Tap, cut, or slide the objects on the screen to propel the story forward:

— Learn COUNTING by feeding a monkey with the correct amount of juicy berries gathered from various branches. Yum yum!
— Create ALGORITHMS for a ninja to climb through the skyscraper to meet his friend, Kitty.
— Recognize PATTERNS and assemble figures from parts to continue a sequence of mysterious Egyptian deities. Click-click.
— Master POLYGONS by putting together colorful jigsaw puzzles of Arctic animals.
— Improve SPATIAL SENSE by assembling flowers from various geometrical figures and wait for busy little bees to come.
— Conquer ARITHMETIC by adding and subtracting fireflies dancing in the falling twilight.
— Grasp hands-on knowledge of DIVISION by placing the loads, seagulls, and air balloons among drifting Icebergs. Boom!

RELATING TO A CHILD’S INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPMENTAL NEEDS
— The difficulty level is adaptive and tailored to a child’s level of competence depending on performance.
— A variety of games with 100+ skill-building challenges give children the chance to foster all-round thinking.
— Awards for achievements boost children's self-esteem and confidence in maths and problem-solving.
— There are no low scores, failures, limits, or stress. Children deal intuitively with the games and eventually learn to think deeply and solve unconventional tasks.

PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT WORKS WONDERS
— Co-use the app with your children to discover games they enjoy;
— Monitor your child’s progress through the parents' dashboard;
— Praise your child for efforts and accomplishments!

WHAT ELSE?
— A new game every month keeps children novelty.
— The plan runs on a monthly subscription with no in-app purchases, contains no ads and is set in a kid-safe mode.
— Available for iPad and iPhone.

SUBSCRIPTION:
• We offer a free 2-day trial period for all new users. After your free trial, you can choose to subscribe on a monthly or annual basis.
• If you change your mind at any point, cancellation is easy through your iTunes settings.
• Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time from Account Settings. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

PRIVACY:
Funexpected is committed to protecting your privacy and the privacy of your children. Read about our privacy policy and terms of use here: http://funexpectedapps.com/privacy and http://funexpectedapps.com/terms.

ABOUT FUNEXPECTED
We help children to foster mathematical thinking and enjoyment of maths with scientifically well-designed iOS learning games.

WE LOVE MAKING NEW FRIENDS!

Instagram @funexpected.math
Facebook: funexpected.apps

container.value:

creator: Funexpected LTD
descriptionHtml:
Get your child excited about learning and solving problems!
Funexpected games are designed to create challenges that the children actually want to tackle.

FUNEXPECTED MATH is the new app that embeds findings in educational neuroscience into digital learning games for children aged 3 to 7.

*** Winner of a Kidscreen award, Webby People’s Choice award, gold winner of Horizon Interactive award and a part of Notable Media list by the American Library Association ***

We don't teach children stand-alone skills, but rather, help them to cultivate various types of thinking and to attain the potential to learn anything!

“This is the most beautiful learning math app I have come across so far for my kids! It engages them with the world of mathematics in an innovative, intuitive, and imaginative way. Try it out and see yourself :)” - Violetta, app user from Italy

A truly DIVERSE collection of GAMES located across the scenic landscapes of Japan, Egypt and Greenland awaits!

— Learn COUNTING by feeding a monkey with the correct amount of juicy berries gathered from various branches. Yum yum!
— Create ALGORITHMS for a ninja to climb through the skyscraper to meet his friend, Kitty.
— Take a sharp Samurai's sword and slash falling GEOMETRIC SHAPES. Ki-ai!
— Explore SYMMETRY by stretching rubber bands on the geoboard to complete given geometrical objects.
— Recognise PATTERNS and assemble figures from parts to continue a sequence of mysterious Egyptian deities.
— Head a nimble snake to crawl over the sands to pick up NUMBERS in a given sequence and lengthen its tail.
— Master POLYGONS by putting together colorful jigsaw puzzles of Arctic animals.
— Apply LOGIC to catch the right type of fish with a net and fill the fish pond with your haul.
— Improve SPATIAL SENSE by assembling flowers from various geometrical figures and wait for busy little bees to come.
— Learn ARITHMETIC by adding and subtracting fireflies dancing in the falling twilight.
— Grasp hands-on knowledge of DIVISION by placing the loads, seagulls and air balloons among drifting Icebergs. Boom!

RELATING TO A CHILD’S INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPMENTAL NEEDS
— The difficulty level is adaptive and tailored to a child’s level of competence depending on correctly solved challenges.
— A variety of games with 1000+ skill-building challenges give children the chance to foster all-round thinking.
— Awards for achievements boost children's confidence in problem-solving and math.
— There are no low scores, limits or stress. Children deal intuitively with the games and eventually learn to think deeply and solve unconventional tasks.

WHAT ELSE?
— A new game every month keeps children entertained.
— Monitor your child’s progress through the parents' dashboard.
— The app contains no ads and is set in a kid-safe mode.

SUBSCRIPTION:
— You can choose to subscribe on a monthly or annual basis with a free 7-day trial period for all new users.
— If you change your mind at any point, cancellation is easy through your Google Play Store settings.
— In addition, you can play a free limited version of the app that does not need a subscription.
— Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time from Google Play Store. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

PRIVACY:
Funexpected is committed to protecting your privacy and the privacy of your children. Read about our privacy policy and terms of use here: http://funexpectedapps.com/privacy and http://funexpectedapps.com/terms.

WE LOVE MAKING NEW FRIENDS!
Twitter @funexpectedmath
Instagram @funexpected.math
Facebook: funexpected.apps

appDetails.developerAddress:
71-75, Shelton Street, London, Greater London,
WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hola - it's time for our festive update!

DÍA DE LOS MUERTOS

On November 1, we will travel to Mexico to take part in an unforgettable celebration of the Day of the Dead. Its festivities unfold in an explosion of color and life-affirming joy.

- Decorate the altar (“ofrenda”) for the festivities by solving tricky mathematical tasks.
- Learn about the holiday’s traditions from the Magical Genie.
- Complete the event to earn an exclusive postcard to show your friends.

title: Funexpected Maths (Kids 3-7)

container.value:
71-75, Shelton Street, London, Greater London,
WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom

creator: Funexpected LTD
descriptionHtml:
Get your child excited about learning and solving problems!
Funexpected Maths is the award-winning platform that helps kids aged 3-7 develop their mathematical thinking. Your child will master number fluency, strengthen logical thinking, develop spatial skills and explore coding & algorithms.

Our year-long course turns early math learning into a fabulous journey through space and time with a continuing storyline and weekly missions, all supported by a digital tutor.

To improve our application, we work with specialists in math education from around the world, at institutions including the University College of London, the University of California (Berkeley), and the Higher School of Economics. Our educational games are created with support from the latest research by neuropsychologists and new results in the fields of cognitive development and early learning.

*** Winner of an EdTech Breakthrough award, Mom’s Choice award, Kidscreen award, Webby People’s Choice award, Horizon Interactive award Gold Winner and featured on the Notable Media List by the American Library Association ***

A PEEK INSIDE OUR CURRICULUM:
Number Sense: visualizing and decomposing numbers, addition and subtraction, skip-counting, basics of division and proportion, place value, number line and more
Logical Thinking: finding patterns, logical reasoning, grouping by features, schemes and diagrams, logical operators, word problems and more
Spatial Skills & Geometry: shape recognition, lengths and measurements, mental rotation and folding, symmetry, map reading, projections and more
Algorithms & Coding: simple programs, following and building algorithms, conditional operators, flowcharts and more

Our program adapts to each child's age and unique needs in every area.

"As most educators, I'm searching for quality programs to share with my students, and I just found Funexpected Maths. I love it and wanted you to know I'm sharing it with my families and all the districts I'm consulting with around the country. Thank you!" - Iowa School Librarian Leader

“This is the most beautiful learning math app I have come across so far for my kids! It engages them with the world of mathematics in an innovative, intuitive, and imaginative way. Try it out and see yourself :)” - Violetta, app user, Italy

RELATING TO A CHILD’S INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPMENTAL NEEDS
— The difficulty level of Funexpected Maths is entirely adaptive and tailored to every individual child’s level of competence depending on correctly solved challenges, hints and learning patterns
— A variety of games with 1,000+ skill-building challenges give children the valuable chance to foster all-round thinking
— Awards for achievements boost children's confidence in problem-solving and various math areas

WHAT ELSE?

— Festive events throughout the year to celebrate holidays from different cultures
— Easily monitor your child’s progress through the Funexpected Parent Dashboard
— The app contains no ads and is set in kid-safe mode, so you can confidently let your children play by themselves as well as join them in their learning adventures

SUBSCRIPTION:
• Choose to subscribe on a monthly or annual basis with a free 7-day trial period for all new users
• If you change your mind at any point, cancellation is easy through your Account Settings
• You can play a free limited version of the Funexpected Maths app that does not require a subscription. You have access to a limited number of tasks for free
• Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time via your Account Settings Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period

PRIVACY:
Funexpected Maths is committed to protecting the privacy of you and your children. Read about our privacy policy and terms of use here: http://funexpectedapps.com/privacy and http://funexpectedapps.com/terms.

We hope your children enjoy their journey into learning maths with Funexpected Math.

In this latest update, we’ve introduced several bug fixes and some other great improvements.

As always, we would love to hear your opinions on the app and answer any questions you may have. Write to us at support@funexpected.org and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!

title:
Funexpected Maths (Kids 3-7)
11.4.7

container.value:
71-75, Shelton Street, London, Greater London,
WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom

creator: Funexpected LTD
descriptionHtml:
Get your child excited about learning and solving problems!
Funexpected Maths is the award-winning platform that helps kids aged 3-7 develop their mathematical thinking. Your child will master number fluency, strengthen logical thinking, develop spatial skills and explore coding & algorithms.

Our year-long course turns early math learning into a fabulous journey through space and time with a continuing storyline and weekly missions, all supported by a digital tutor.

To improve our application, we work with specialists in math education from around the world, at institutions including the University College of London, the University of California (Berkeley), and the Higher School of Economics. Our educational games are created with support from the latest research by neuropsychologists and new results in the fields of cognitive development and early learning.

*** Winner of an EdTech Breakthrough award, Mom’s Choice award, Kidscreen award, Webby People’s Choice award, Horizon Interactive award Gold Winner and featured on the Notable Media List by the American Library Association ***

A PEEK INSIDE OUR CURRICULUM:
Number Sense: visualizing and decomposing numbers, addition and subtraction, skip-counting, basics of division and proportion, place value, number line and more
Logical Thinking: finding patterns, logical reasoning, grouping by features, schemes and diagrams, logical operators, word problems and more
Spatial Skills & Geometry: shape recognition, lengths and measurements, mental rotation and folding, symmetry, map reading, projections and more
Algorithms & Coding: simple programs, following and building algorithms, conditional operators, flowcharts and more

Our program adapts to each child's age and unique needs in every area.

"As most educators, I'm searching for quality programs to share with my students, and I just found Funexpected Maths. I love it and wanted you to know I'm sharing it with my families and all the districts I'm consulting with around the country. Thank you!" - Iowa School Librarian Leader

“This is the most beautiful learning math app I have come across so far for my kids! It engages them with the world of mathematics in an innovative, intuitive, and imaginative way. Try it out and see yourself :)” - Violetta, app user, Italy

RELATING TO A CHILD’S INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPMENTAL NEEDS
— The difficulty level of Funexpected Maths is entirely adaptive and tailored to every individual child’s level of competence depending on correctly solved challenges, hints and learning patterns
— A variety of games with 1,000+ skill-building challenges give children the valuable chance to foster all-round thinking
— Awards for achievements boost children's confidence in problem-solving and various math areas

WHAT ELSE?

— Festive events throughout the year to celebrate holidays from different cultures
— Easily monitor your child’s progress through the Funexpected Parent Dashboard
— The app contains no ads and is set in kid-safe mode, so you can confidently let your children play by themselves as well as join them in their learning adventures

SUBSCRIPTION:
• Choose to subscribe on a monthly or annual basis with a free 7-day trial period for all new users
• If you change your mind at any point, cancellation is easy through your Account Settings
• You can play a free limited version of the Funexpected Maths app that does not require a subscription. You have access to a limited number of tasks for free
• Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time via your Account Settings Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period

PRIVACY:
Funexpected Maths is committed to protecting the privacy of you and your children. Read about our privacy policy and terms of use here: http://funexpectedapps.com/privacy and http://funexpectedapps.com/terms.

creator: Funexpected LTD
descriptionHtml:
LET YOUR CHILD PLAY THEIR WAY TO MATHS FLUENCY!

Funexpected is an award-winning maths learning app for kids aged 3–7. Our program is carefully crafted by top educators who have trained national maths champions. Delivered by a personal digital tutor, it allows any child to reach the top of their age group in maths.

Backed by studies, recognized by experts:
- Best Original Learning App (Kidscreen Award 2025)
- Best Maths Learning Solution (EdTech Breakthrough Award)
- Best Visual Design (The Webby Award)
…and many more!

Funexpected Maths is a perfect choice for a child’s first maths program. It features multiple learning formats appropriate for preschool maths, kindergarten maths, and elementary maths.

Our mistake-friendly approach sparks curiosity. Next, a personalized learning program builds knowledge. Finally, exercising each topic in various formats reinforces maths confidence. With these three elements, any child can achieve lasting success in maths, that will carry through to higher grades and stay with them for life.

FROM BASIC TO ADVANCED MATHS SKILLS
Funexpected offers various learning formats to exercise diverse maths. Numeracy practice, maths manipulatives, oral problems, logic puzzles, counting games, printable worksheets – with over 10,000 tasks in total!

Six learning programs cater to any preschooler, kindergartener, or elementary student, including advanced and gifted ones. Funexpected covers standard PreK-2 maths curriculum and goes beyond, giving children a deeper and more comprehensive understanding of maths concepts. This is crucial for developing maths confidence and problem-solving skills, essential for success in STEM subjects in middle school.

A PERSONALIZED, VOICE-BASED TUTOR
Our AI tutor tailors the program to a child, scaffolds learning, asks guiding questions instead of serving up answers, introduces maths terms, and provides hints when needed.

It transforms early maths learning into an exciting journey through space and time, with an engaging storyline. Our tutor always supports and motivates a little learner. Plus, the Funexpected world is filled with adorable characters eager to become your child’s friends!

WHAT YOUR CHILD WILL LEARN

Ages 3–4:
- Counting and Numbers
- Identify shapes
- Compare and sort objects
- Recognize visual patterns
- Length and height
and more!

Ages 5–6:
- Count up to 100
- 2D and 3D shapes
- Addition and Subtraction Strategies
- Mental folding and rotation
- Logic puzzles
and more!

Ages 6–7:

- Place value
- Add and subtract 2-digit numbers
- Number patterns
- Logical operators
- Early coding
and more!

Explore the full curriculum in the Parents’ Section of the app!

MAKE MATHS A FAMILY ACTIVITY
Have fun learning together with:
- Handcraft tutorials for hands-on maths exploration
- Printable worksheets for extra practice
- Holiday-themed maths quests for special occasions!

15 MINUTES A DAY IS ENOUGH FOR PROGRESS
No need for long study sessions! Just two 15-minute sessions a week are enough for your child to get ahead of 95% of their peers in a short time.

WHY PARENTS & EDUCATORS LOVE US
“This app is a perfect balance — not too game-like, but also not just another digital worksheet. My students love it and even ask to play during free time!” – Eric, STEM Teacher, Florida.
“This is the most beautifully designed learning app I’ve seen. It introduces maths in such an intuitive and imaginative way!” – Violetta, Parent, Italy.

EXTRA BENEFITS:
- Track progress easily in the Parents’ Section
- 100% ad-free & safe for kids
- Available in 16 languages
- One subscription for all kids in the family

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
Try it free for 7 days
Choose between a monthly or annual subscription
Cancel anytime through iTunes settings
Auto-renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the next billing cycle

PRIVACY COMMITMENT
We prioritize your child’s safety and privacy. Read our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Use here:
funexpectedapps.com/privacy
funexpectedapps.com/terms
